did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

did.unittitle: John M. Clum Collection of Playbills and Programs 1950-2009
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.
did.abstract: Professor of Theater Studies and English at Duke University.
Collection contains playbills and programs for theatrical productions, operas, and ballets from the United States and abroad.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], in the John M. Clum Collection of Playbills and Programs, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

acqinfo.head: Provenance
acqinfo.p: Gift, 2009 (2009-0200), added to the end of the collection.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Collection is unprocessed; cataloged from accession records.
Accession(s) described in this finding aid: 2008-0057, 2008-0298, 2009-0200
Descriptive sources and standards used to create this inventory: DACS, EAD, NCEAD guidelines, and our local Style Guide.
This finding aid is NCEAD compliant.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical Note
bioghist.p: John M. Clum is a professor of Theater Studies and English at Duke University.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection contains playbills and programs for theatrical productions, operas, and ballets from the United States and abroad.

controlaccess.head: Subject Headings
controlaccess.p: These and related materials may be found under the following headings in online catalogs.

scopecontent.p: Collection (2008-0054) contains playbills and programs from theatrical productions, operas, and ballets in the United States and internationally.
The addition (2008-0298) has been interfiled with the existing collection.

arrangement.p: Though this collection remains unprocessed, minimal arrangement has been conducted. Playbills have been foldered according to the title of the play. Folders are arranged alphabetically, but within each folder, the playbills are not in alphabetical or sequential order. (For example, there are several folders of playbills that start with "M.") Boxes 15 through 21 contain operas and ballets, and have not been arranged further at this time.

scopecontent.p: The addition (2009-0200) includes playbills and programs, 2008-2009.
